sub_title: Accounting & Reporting Manager at Exiros BV (Amsterdam, NL) - Techint Group
summary:
Ambitious, goal oriented Accountant with 10 years of experience in financial accounting, reporting, controlling and analysis in a global company (Techint Group) including international experience through different challenging assignments in Scotland, Nigeria, Uruguay and Netherlands. Self-motivated, with proven analytical and leadership skills. Fluent in English and Spanish, average in Portuguese.
 
Career highlights:
Led the set up of a small office of Exiros (procurement company of Tenaris (NYSE: TS) and Ternium (NYSE: TX) in Amsterdam, The Netherlands.
Supported the beginning of the operation of an Exiros trading company in Montevideo, Uruguay and conducted the restructure of the reporting model of Exiros consolidated group.  
I was the local leader of the Administration and Finance department in the take-over by Tenaris of Pipe Coaters Nigeria Ltd.
Supported the Administration and Finance local team in Aberdeen, Scotland, during the absorption of Hydril UK by Tenaris Global Services UK.

courses.name: Practical VAT for non-specialists - Deloitte, Aberdeen Scotland (2011)
Principals of Transfer Pricing - IBDF Amsterdam, Netherlands (2015)

profile_positions.description:
As head of Administration & Finance in Exiros B.V. (Techint Group) in the Netherlands, responsible for the financial information of three entities, the consolidation of the Financial Statements of Exiros group and the issuance of several reports for the management and board of directors.  
Main responsibilities include to coordinate and supervise the preparation of financial accounting (AR, AP. GL), public and managerial reporting, SOX, tax and legal compliance and management control tasks (actual vs budget analysis). Other responsibilities include recruit, train and coach staff.
profile_positions.title: Accounting & Reporting Manager

profile_positions.description:
My first goal was to revamp the Consolidation process of Exiros group bearing in mind the particularities in relation to the business unit allocation described in the Amended and Restated Shareholders Agreement to ensure a smooth reporting to its shareholders (Tenaris and Ternium). Other main responsibilities were:
- Perform the monthly and quarterly reporting of Exiros consolidated group under both internal and IFRS Standards.
- Issue Exiros BV Annual Report following external audit requirements.
- Train new staff in Amsterdam office focusing on accounting and reporting internal processes, SAP FI/CO and Consolidation.
- Perform quarterly accounting and reporting SOX controls.
- Work with tax advisors on the preparation of the company´s tax returns.
- Analyze actual fixed expenses of each area against budget figures, propose corrections and prepare reports to the management with main explanations.
profile_positions.title: Reporting Senior Analyst

profile_positions.description:
As Administration and Finance team leader on the take-over project of one of the largest pipe coating companies in Nigeria, my main goals and responsibilities were:
- Carry on an audit of the Financial Statements to determine the Working Capital level, which would be the base of the price adjustment as per the Share Purchase Agreement.
- Legal management of the rights and obligations, as well as legal indemnities provided by the Share Purchase Agreement.
- Take over the responsibilities in each sub-area of AD&FI, train the team members in the Tenaris Normative System and procedures, targeted to ensure the smooth compliance with managerial and public reporting requirements of the company.
- Control the revenue recognition per project, analyze deviations against forecast and follow up on the completion of the invoicing in close contact with the Contract Management team.  
- Analyze the indirect costs of production and fixed expenses of the company to then propose actions to reduce costs.
- Implement and work with corporate departments that centralize some functions in the group.
- Implement and go live in SAP system.
profile_positions.title: Controller (ad interim)

profile_positions.description:
Responsible for all the financial aspects of the threading and commercial company in Aberdeen, Scotland.
Main responsibilities: Lead a small accounting team for the day-to-day accounting and reporting activities (AP, AR, GL, MM), assist on tasks related to the absorption by TGS UK of Hydril UK, coordinate, prepare and follow up the annual budget of fixed expenses, manage the preparation and the audit of the annual financial statements, prepare and analyze tax returns (CIT, VAT, EC sales lists, Intrastats).
profile_positions.title: Controller (ad interim)

profile_positions.description: Responsible as a Controller for the financial reporting of certain branches of the Tenaris commercial network (UK, France, Egypt, Nigeria). Main responsibilities: perform monthly financial closings, supervise AP and AR reconciliations and payroll process, P&L and Balance Sheet analysis, prepare quarterly financial reports (IFRS norms) and financial reviews, analyze fixed expenses, provide training and support.
profile_positions.title: Reporting Analyst

profile_positions.description:
Assigned to the Corporate Portfolio Administration and Supervision Unit of the Inter-American Investment Corporation, which is a multilateral organization member of the Inter-American Development Bank (IDB) Group.
Main responsibilities:
- Analyze Financial Statements, operation variables and ratio calculation.
- Research and evaluate market information that may affect the current portfolio.
- Control compliance with contract provisions
- Give support in the preparation of Supervisory Reports.
profile_positions.title: Financial Analyst - Inter-American Investment Corporation (IDB Group)

profile_positions.description:
Worked in the external audit department for 3 years.
Participated in many assignments involving national and international companies in many different industries in the commercial and services areas as well as financial institutions. My main customers were Phillip Morris, Banco Galicia, Gramón Bagó. General tasks performed included: 
Audit of financial statements;
Analysis of internal control systems;
Agreed-upon procedures 
    Due diligence
Prepare several reports under regulations issued by the Central Bank, among many other assignments.
profile_positions.title: Senior Assistant in external audit department
